title: Razer Summoner Showdow #6 presented by Razer

embed.description: Conditions of participation: Every player of your roster needs a totally free account on escene.de: Click here to register for free. Support: Feel free to use our support form if you need help or join IRC channel #escene for support during the tournament.

body:
Are you ready for the Razer Summoner Showdown?

*When?* 4.03.2015 18:30 CET
*Prices?*
1. 5x 3200 RP + Turnier Skin + 5x Naga Hex Green 
2. 5x 2400 RP + 5x Goliathus Alpha
3. 5x 1600 RP
4. 5x 800 RP
*Modus?* ARAM 5on5
*Where?* [Turnierseite](http://showdown.escene.de/pages,538.html)
*Which language?* The main language is english, but our admins can speak german too

> Tournament procedure: The bracket with the matches will be released at 18:30 CET. You can contact your opponents by adding the team captain via his Summoner name or by contacting your opponent via IRC channel #escene. You can find the Summoner names at the participants list. The matches are played via a custom game which one of the participants has to create. The result must be submitted via the "Submit result" button. Screenshots have to be taken by the winner team. You will only need to submit them if there are any issues.

If you got any quetions feel free to add me or write an e-mail to mm@escene.de

Gettings,
Mr Poke
